author: Staff Reporter
text:
Students of YMCA College of Physical Education staged a protest on the campus alleging lack of basic amenities and harassment by faculty.

G. Radha, one of the students, alleged that they had been buying drinking water as the college did not make a provision for it. “Also, the bathroom doors have not been repaired for a while now,” she said.

P. Bharathi, another student, said that a few faculty members had been harassing some students and threatening to fail them. Police sources said students also alleged that the playground and swimming pool had been leased out for other purposes. College authorities said they were not aware that students had such issues and that they would resolve them soon.
title: Students seek amenities
